text: Blues Highway is a 1994 American short documentary film directed by Bill Guttentag and Vince DiPersio. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 short films Category:1994 films Category:1994 documentary films Category:1994 independent films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Bill Guttentag
title: Blues Highway (film)
